title: Dead Freaks Tell No Tales
description: Welcome to the Freak Zone The circus is in town and Sir Edward has decided to run away and join them. To make matters worse, the murders start as soon as the Gustav Brothers’ Circus pulls into town. There are plenty of suspects with motive, but with a circus full of freaks, finding the killer might not be so easy. With a runaway monkey and killer freaks running amok, things couldn’t get much worse, or so she thinks, but that’s just the beginning of the chaos. Life has some interesting twists in store for reaper, Jazz Sweeney.
author: Kendra Ashe
